public class AthenaTurn
extends BasicTurn

    • athenaTileToMove

      protected java.util.Collection<Tile.IndexTile> athenaTileToMove​(Worker w)
      Parameters:
      w - : worker selected by the player at the beginning of a turn
      Returns:
      collection of tiles where workers can move according to Athena's Power

    • handleRemainingOperations

      protected void handleRemainingOperations()
      Since Athena could limit Artemis'power, we decide to let AthenaTurn handle this situation. So we decide override handleRemainingOperation to handle ChooseOperation.
      Overrides:
      handleRemainingOperations in class BasicTurn

    • getOptions

      public Options getOptions()
      Overrides:
      getOptions in class BasicTurn
      Returns:
      the options the current player has, according to his god's power and Athena's power
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalStateException - We put this method in turn and not in gods because we have to handle also athenaTurn. In fact AthenaTurn will override this method checking Athena's Power
